title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 341.22 - Bylaws
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 341.22 - Bylaws

State Regulations
(a) The student
assembly shall adopt, and may amend or repeal such bylaws as it deems
advisable, consistent with this Part, governing its activities and
procedures. (b) The adoption, amendment or repeal of such bylaws must receive a two-thirds vote of the
student assembly membership. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
341.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
